name: Tiniest Dungeon
description:
controls:

left/right arrow keys: move

up arrow key: jump

down arrow key: fall through platform

[C]: use weapon

[X]: interact

[V]: toggle between weapons

Obs:

- this game is in a super duper early prototype version

- there is no music

- there is no sounds

- to exit the level grab the key and interact with the door lock

- if one of the doors is missing or the key is absent press [K] to generate another level

- you can find different types of weapons in chests

- attacks from the player can destroy the chest

- you can't aim at the mouse, this is intended

-feedback is appreciated.
